name: MessageWire
title: MessageWire
description: MessageWire is a Zero Knowledge authentication and encryption wrapper for a NetMQ Dealer socket (client) Router socket (server) combination.

packOptions.summary: MessageWire is a Zero Knowledge authentication and encryption wrapper for a NetMQ Dealer socket (client) Router socket (server) combination.
packOptions.releaseNotes: Written for netstandard1.3 so .NET Framework 4.6 and Core 1.0 and up are supported.
